sense.gloss: to be tied together, to be connected to, to be linked to
to lead to, to be related to

x: 血がつながる・ちがつながる

sense.gloss: to tie, to fasten, to restrain
to maintain, to preserve, to keep
to transfer (phone call), to put a person through
to hedge, to buy or sell forward
as one would expect, just as you'd expect (from), just like (someone)
still, all the same, after all
connection, linking, linkage, link, liaison, contact, coordination
to connect, to join, to join or tie or knot together
dependents, family members that one has to support
encumbrances, things that tie one down
to tie, to fasten, to hitch
to secure (trust, patronage of customers, etc.), to keep (an employee, someone's interest, etc.), to save (someone's life)
maintaining contact (with), keeping in contact (with), keeping in touch (with), making oneself seen
introducing (unacquainted people), getting acquainted (with one another)
bridge loan, relief or emergency loan
to be related to someone by blood
linking together, tying in a row
filling in (e.g. between speakers at a meeting, acts at a show), material used to fill in (between speeches at a meeting, etc.), anecdote
to ration out and survive on (some food)

sdata.j: ↑僅↑↓わず↓かな↑不注意↑↓ふちゅうい↓が↑大↑↓だい↓↑惨事↑↓さんじ↓に↑繋↑↓つな↓がる↑恐↑↓おそ↓れがある。
sdata.e: Slight inattention can cause a great disaster.

sdata.j: ↑犬↑↓いぬ↓が↑噛↑↓か↓み↑付↑↓つ↓かないように↑鎖↑↓くさり↓で↑繋↑↓つな↓いだ↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいですよ。
sdata.e: You had better chain up the dog so that he won't bite.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑傲慢↑↓ごうまん↓が↑凋落↑↓ちょうらく↓に↑繋↑↓つな↓がった。
sdata.e: His arrogance led to his downfall.

sdata.j: ママ～！あのお↑姉↑↓ねえ↓ちゃんとお↑兄↑↓にい↓ちゃん、お↑手↑↓て↓↑手↑↓しゅ↓↑繋↑↓つな↓いで、すっごく↑仲良↑↓なかよ↓しさんだね～！
sdata.e: Mama! That lady and man are holding hands, they're great friends aren't they!

sdata.j: その↑新↑↓あたら↓しいトンネルによってイギリスとフランスが↑繋↑↓つな↓がります。
sdata.e: The new tunnel will link Great Britain and France.

sdata.j: ↑胃↑↓い↓は↑小腸↑↓しょうちょう↓に↑繋↑↓つな↓がっている。
sdata.e: The stomach connects to the small intestine.

sdata.j: ↑自慰↑↓じい↓は↑狂気↑↓きょうき↓に↑繋↑↓つな↓がる。
インターネットを↑繋↑↓つな↓ごうとしても、↑繋↑↓つな↓がりません。
sdata.e: Even if I try to connect to the internet, I can't connect.

sdata.j: 「もしもし」「お↑客様↑↓きゃくさま↓のご↑都合↑↓つごう↓によりお↑繋↑↓つな↓ぎできません」
sdata.e: Hello. "Due to the customer's circumstances, a connection cannot be made."

sdata.j: 「もしもし、↑田中↑↓たなか↓さんのお↑宅↑↓たく↓ですか？」「はい」「↑携帯↑↓けいたい↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓に↑何↑↓なん↓↑度↑↓ど↓かおかけしたのですが、↑繋↑↓つな↓がらなかったのでご↑自宅↑↓じたく↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓へご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓させていただきました」「ははは。ごめんごめん。↑携帯↑↓けいたい↓↑料金↑↓りょうきん↓↑払↑↓はら↓ってないんだ」
sdata.e: Hello, is this Tanaka's household? "Yes." "I tried calling you multiple times on your mobile, but I couldn't get through, so I used your home number instead." "Hahaha. My bad, my bad. I still need to pay my mobile phone bill."

sdata.j: ↑犬↑↓いぬ↓が↑噛↑↓か↓み↑付↑↓つ↓かないように↑鎖↑↓くさり↓で↑繋↑↓つな↓いだ↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいですよ。
sdata.e: You'd better chain up the dog so he won't bite.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑過剰↑↓かじょう↓なまでの↑対抗↑↓たいこう↓↑心↑↓しん↓を↑燃↑↓も↓やすのは、↑結局↑↓けっきょく↓↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑身↑↓み↓を↑滅↑↓ほろ↓ぼすことに↑繋↑↓つな↓がります。
sdata.e: If you're constantly trying to one-up others, you'll only end up harming yourself.

sdata.j: フォークダンスで↑男子↑↓だんし↓と↑手↑↓て↓を↑繋↑↓つな↓ぐのがやだ。
sdata.e: I don't want to hold hands with a boy in a folk dance.
I want to hold your hand.

sdata.j: ネットに↑繋↑↓つな↓がらなかった。
sdata.e: I couldn't connect to the network.
Is it OK if I hold your hand?
